bibl.title: The Measure "to didiploun".
bibl.note: Cf. Idem, A New Measure: to didiploun, Aegyptus 1975. This measure was not confined to the Hermopolite nome but was also in use in the rest of Egypt. It occurs only in texts of the late Byzantine period.
bibl.seg: Sijpesteijn Pieter Johannes, The Measure "to didiploun".

Cf. Idem, A New Measure: to didiploun, Aegyptus 1975. This measure was not confined to the Hermopolite nome but was also in use in the rest of Egypt. It occurs only in texts of the late Byzantine period.
